        public String getResetValidatorsTrigger()
        Force a shorter scope (than session scoped) for the ListDataModel by always resetting it before it is rendered
        Returns:
        Always empty string

      • getAvailableValidators

        public javax.faces.model.ListDataModel<ValidatorsBean.ValidatorItem> getAvailableValidators()
        Gets the available key validators taking into account access rules. The admin need access to view vlidators, and to all certificate profiles referenced by the Validator.
        Returns:
        ListDataModel<ValidatorItem>
